mapper.select: SELECT goods.goodsId,goods.goodsName,goods.userId,goods.goodsPlace,goods.takeTime,goods.frequency,goods.goodsType,goods.goodsPhoto,goods.goodsCode,goods.saveTimes,goods.placeTime,goodstype.typeName,goods.goodsDescribe, CASE goods.goodsPublic WHEN '1' THEN '公开' WHEN '0' THEN '私密' END AS goodsPublic FROM goods,goodstype where goodstype.typeid = goodsType and goods.userId = #{userId};
